description.value:
At 10th level, you can summon a battle companion. This ability functions as @Compendium[pf1.spells.choriern682hgptb]{Summon Nature's Ally IV}, with a duration of 1 minute. This ability can summon only one animal, regardless of the list used, and the creature’s type changes to plant instead of animal.

For every 2 levels beyond 10th, the level of the summon nature’s ally spell increases by 1, to a maximum of @Compendium[pf1.spells.x6y3kyvxf8s31jhy]{Summon Nature's Ally IX} at 20th level.
